definition[0]: to say that you do, are etc something, especially when it is not really true
example[0]: The government professes to care about the poor.
example[1]: He professed to be an expert on Islamic art.
definition[1]: to state a personal feeling or belief openly
example[2]: He finally made up his mind to profess his love for her.
example[3]: He professed himself satisfied with the results.
definition[2]: to have a religion or belief
